data.actual_result: A blank profile appears, and closes shortly after, putting you back to top of the reactions lisy
data.short_description: Blank profile when trying to access an uncached user through the "who reacted to message" list
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message with reactions and someone who is not in your client cache reacts - Long tap the message and get in the "reactions" list - Click on the uncached user
